concept.title: Control the Appearance of Dimension Text
concept.shortdesc: Dimension text could be comprised of user-supplied text, prefixes, and suffixes provided by the dimension style, and generated measurements. For example, you can add a radiumsymbol as a prefixto a measurement, or add an abbreviation for a unit beyond the text, such as cm.

conbody.p: You can also set the text style and formats of color, height for the dimension text.
